name: Level 1
briefing: On a routine fleet patrol
Your squadron is attacked by 'The Dark Ones'
Defeat all enemies
debriefing: You survived the ambush
Now you must choose your next mission:
SPACE: Investigate Distress Call  B: Examine Wreckage

name: Track the Enemy
briefing: After reporting the attack
You are orderd to investigate a distress signal
Received from a nearby research vessel.
debriefing: You reach the research vessel's sector
And find an attacking enemy squad

name: The Wreckage
briefing: Communications broke during battle.
Examine wreckage of your fleet
kill any enemies you encounter
debriefing: You found cache of Commonwealth warheads
Fly to the nearby outpost to
Have your ship fitted with the new weapons

name: Save the research vessle
briefing: The research vessel contains valuable information
It must not fall to the enemy
Protect it at all costs
debriefing: You were able to fight off the enemy
For your assistance, you ship was fitted
With a more powerful laser system

name: Not really a shortcut
briefing: Fight your way to the outpost
With the losses suffered the this sector's fleet
Your ship must be equipped with the new weapons
debriefing: Your ship was equipeed with powerful bombs
Choose your next mission
SPACE: Attack fleet  B: Protect the research outpost

name: Level 6
briefing: The local forces are ready
For a counter attack
Destroy the enemy destroyer fleet
debriefing: With the destruction of the fleet
The local forces have time to regroup
And to plan their next move

name: Level 7
briefing: You must fight your way to
The Commonwealth Space Force
Staging outpost for the final battle
debriefing: It's time for the final offensive
Choose your battle plan
SPACE: Attack head on   B: Attack from the flank

name: Level 8
briefing: The space around the enemy stronghold
Is very heavily defended
Cut a path through the enemy defences
debriefing: You cleared a path for the fleet
Commonwealth forces are now in place
For the final offensive

name: Level 9
briefing: Approach the enemy from the flank
Fly hrough the asteroid belt
and rendevous with the fleet
debriefing: Your flight through the asteroid belt
caught the enemy off gaurd
Deliver the final strike

name: Level 10
briefing: It's time for the final battle
Fly your way to the enemy mothership
And end this war!
debriefing: You successfully destroyed the
Nakaan fleet. The Commonwealth
is safe once again thanks to you
